title: Stellarr Client Reporting
description: Clients only get good results when they put the time and effort in to call their leads. But traditionally, it's been a pain to keep them accountable.

title: Codified Websites
description: Multi-tenant business websites that allow agencies to resell websites with extremely minimal investment and maintenance.

title: Stellarr Ad Management
description: Automated ad creation and management for agencies to improve client results and agency efficiency.

title: Stellarr CRM Enhancements
description: Nobody ever remembers to add tasks or summaries after phone calls. Make that remembered.

title: Chariots Entertainment
description: My first serious endeavor right out of college. Grew to over 1,000 subscribers within a couple of months. Then got bored.

title: ShopDrive Agency
description: My solution to the boredom from Chariots. But it also gave me a good example of why it's not a bad idea to change ideas if one doesn't fit. Or get you excited. Ever.
